Name: Tanvi
Title: Peaceful place
Review: It is one of the places where you feel positive vibes and peacefulness in Lucknow . Spent some quality time with my family here .

Name: Yogesh P
Title: Nice place for visit
Review: Very nice place for visit with family. There was many trees in park. You may visit with food from home and enjoy lunch there. There was different swings for kids.

Name: Niraj K
Title: Ideal for Summer Evenings
Review: A nice place for spending evenings in hot summer. Attraction for kids to enjoy the Pedal Boat ride in an arificial river.Even you can enjoy your evening time here in cool breeze.

Name: Nabeel N
Title: Calm and peaceful
Review: Very nice place to visit with family. Spent a day with family there and it comes out to be peaceful and fun. Really good tress everywhere. You can take your home food there. Perfect for family outing.

Name: rsraghavan6
Title: Nice place
Review: It's the most old and popular park in Lucknow, great place to spend a entire day with your family, you better get your food stuff with you, they have it there but a bit over priced. They also have parking facility.Have Fun!

Name: Manas R
Title: Common park
Review: A good place when you are with your friends but don't expect some extraordinary experience here. Many other places are there in Lucknow to explore when you come here for few days.

Name: 592abck
Title: Best place here
Review: Best place here in Lucknow to spend time with everyone. Clean place, ample parking and peaceful environment

Name: nirmalsrivastava1000
Title: best park in lucknow
Review: This is seriously one of the best park in lucknow with all its attraction like the roller-coaster , swinging boat and the big water slide though i think the slide has being closed now , but still it is on of the best park .It even has a big park to play .A part place to bond with family

Name: Inspiration821481
Title: Great place to hangout with kids
Review: There is literally ample space for the kids to roam and play by themselves, but fr me its that dragon boat swing makes my day...

Name: Amit M
Title: Remebrance of my childhood days
Review: I used to visit this park when I was a school going child. Despite being one of the oldest park of Lucknow; it is still maintained. Becomes bit crowdy with children in the evening. Visited this place again in Apr'18 during my visit to Lucknow for remembrance of my childhood days

Name: Niya1315
Title: Children Park
Review: There is another park adjacent to it, which is called Hathi Park. This park is little more greener than Hathi Park.Gautam Buddha Park becomes crowded during weekends. Nice place to go with family and friends.

Name: Robert G
Title: How parks would look if designed by someone who hated children.
Review: Nothing works, everything is rusted, the lake looks like it is a sewer and there are transvestites wandering around asking for money.Thank goodness the Buddha has already achieved enlightenment so he is spared another reincarnation and the possibility of having to visit his park.Avoid at all costs.

Name: Aarav K
Title: Popular Park
Review: From childhood I am going here. This park is quite fame in lucknow. A large number of people come here to enjoy. I love to go here. Must visit place for everyone.

Name: AAA
Title: Impressive
Review: Must visit place of lucknow. Gautam Buddha park is quite green and beautiful all around. There is a fascination in the park. There is a lot to do fun.

Name: Hitesh Rathore
Title: A community park
Review: This Gautam Buddha park is one of the attractions of Lucknow,located on the verge of the city was built 30 years ago. It's a perfect half a day out with family with children rides boats lawns and other facilities to hang around.

Name: Dryogendranath M
Title: Visit to Gautam Budha Park, Lucknow
Review: This  place is worth visiting by the visitors of any age. It is situated in the heart of the city and can be easily accessed.The natural scenes arequite impressive

Name: Aman K
Title: Best park for people of all ages
Review: One of my favorite parks. It's very popular park. There is so much fun for every age of people. There is a lot of interest here especially for children. Very nice place to go with your family.

Name: Vibhu S
Title: Oldest Park in Lucknow
Review: This is place of Gautam Buddha Park in Lucknow nearest of College and there was different type of Hammock

Name: msadiqsalman
Title: A Must visit place for childrens
Review: The park is very famous for its swings and boating. There is a canteen also , although not very good. The ticket is quiet cheap and the toy train is also very attractive among children.

Name: saini74
Title: Walk on Greenish
Review: good space with greenish area and cleaness. Good place to spend quality time with childrens in cool evening only, the ticket fare also very less, playarea is nice, kids love it

Name: rachvinod
Title: good garden
Review: This is quite a good green open space for people to enjoy long walks and children to play around happily.

Name: BantakalDotCom
Title: Children's or Kids Park in just 6km from Lucknow Railway station,
Review: This park is around 6km away from railway station. It's having children's play area, walking track and seats to sit and relax for some time. Entry to this park is Rs 5 and the perfect time to visit this park is around evening. This park is very easy to find as it's attached to the main road. Park opens at 7am and closes at 9 pm. Do not forget: If you found this review helpful, please click THANK below.

Name: Shruti_Poki
Title: Recreation park for family outings
Review: Famous among children and families for evening recreational outing. Rides, Boating and eateries make this a budget accessible place for all. fun day activity place.

Name: kc j
Title: A good park for children
Review: This is a nice park with a good statue of Gautama Budha.  It has a number of rides and swings for kids. In fact it has a lot of amusement for the children. It is well kept.The boating facility is ok. The day we went it was not operating.

Name: Kakoli C
Title: Can be avoided
Review: This place and adjacent Kansiram Smarak are grand structures constructed with pink colored rock. These huge structures are completely made of rock and become so hot it's difficult to go ear it during summer. Avoidable.

Name: Makarand Pundalik
Title: very good
Review: quite well maintained place. better to go in evening or early morning if you are visiting in summer.

Name: Ronak J
Title: Good place
Review: This place give me the soothing and calming effect everytime I visit just a fantastic experience and memories here

Name: Ronak S
Title: another beauty
Review: Lucknow has some of the best parks in town. The Gautam buddha park is huge and very peaceful. Good place to spend time with family on weekend evening

Name: sujatapant
Title: nice place
Review: this is an old park built on the river banks of the Gomti river.it is peaceful till the crowds come in .it has places to sit,relax,boating .could do with some better upkeep.

Name: SKBhatiya
Title: worth a visit
Review: My childhood memories are relived by visiting this park almost after 24 years, it has been well kept and is much better now.a good place to spend half a day or an entire evening with family and children. Children will enjoy here

Name: sunilagrawa111
Title: An old park
Review: The park was built about 40 years back on the bank of  river Gomti with pedal boat  facility.It was an good attraction till 20 years ago but gradually lost its attraction.It is not very well maintained and some new attractions should be added to repopulate it. Just time pass place

Name: shalinisharma
Title: Best place to hangout in evening
Review: If you are looking for a peaceful place to spend your evenings, do visit this place..With and amazing view of gomti nadi and beautiful breeze you are surely going to come back. Plus the lighting on the gomti bridge makes the view spectacular.

Name: Nivesh A
Title: An old attraction
Review: It is just an old attraction. Nowadays it does not have anything interesting. Not many people go here as there are better places inlucknow to visit... in terms of parks

Name: Vijaypsingh81
Title: Excellent Park, nicely maintained.
Review: Small but very beautiful Park in Lucknow.one can visit the place in the evening in Park lighting.It has got very nice boating.overall ambience is good in this park.

Name: NayanKothari
Title: Good place
Review: A huge garden nicely maintained and with nice monuments. Good place for evening or early morning walk.

Name: nik_0107
Title: Well Kept
Review: Well maintained, great to visit during evening. Right next to the river bridge and offer great photo shots.

Name: Arpitgupta25
Title: Evening place
Review: An ordinary park with boating and lots of food shops and park struture is good beside gomti river ..

Name: travellerasr1407
Title: One can miss
Review: An ordinary park with buddha statue, needs good maintaince, dusbins were heaped full and was not cleaned for long

Name: Sundeepgupta
Title: old and beautiful
Review: while the city has a lot of parks now, this old park still have its own place. It is very famous among locals for evening outing with children.

Name: Romil M
Title: nice
Review: its a nice place and very calm and relaxing.. u will enjoy it if u r a believer must visit if in that area

Name: manoj k
Title: Good park visit for Pcnic
Review: one can visit this park with young children . young enjoy this park playing. a picnic can planed in winter specially on a sunny day. Nice Park

Name: chetan1586
Title: Nirvana
Review: Buddha park is one of the few attractions in lucknow where once can go to find peace. Another attraction in the park is the boat ride

Name: nitu_gupta_in
Title: good park !
Review: plan trip with kids. enjoy boatride in the shallow artificial stream flowing around. The park is near to other parks (lemon), so enjoy that area

Name: ApurbaRoy
Title: outing
Review: A place to relax in busy chowk area. Though approach road from all corners are busy and congested. A good place for taking children to stroll and outing

Name: Taz_Bh
Title: It can open any time and close any time.
Review: The park is no doubt huge and beautiful. But the gates for some reason remain closed and some times open at very weird timings.We happened to notice this as we stayed quite close to the place and wanted to visit the same but could not manage an entry cz of the constant closure. The disputed statues are however humongous and well visible from outside as well.

Name: Avadh B
Title: Very Beautiful
Review: I went to this park with lot of hesitation but it is really beautiful. The elephants sculptures are really huge and made with awesome and sharp work with no scope of mistake.

Name: mountaincharm
Title: Little natural world in the heart of city. ..
Review: Although situated between the crowded part of city, but it is a little natural world to please you when you are tired. In front there is busy city road, and behind is river gomti.  Size is few hundred meters. Park is split into two part green park and ride portion.           Green Park comprise of small canal system in which boating by paddle boat is done, and around that a walk way is made. There are two artificial mountain shaped bumps.  And one artificial island.            Ride portion was once a attractive portion but now no fun. Canteen is also there but good quality is average.

Name: Pratibha C
Title: Good place for kids to enjoy
Review: Buddha Park is a nice mid size park for kids to have fun around  and enjoy few swings. Food outside the park is available.Boating facility is also available.

Name: mountaincharm
Title: Small Fun park
Review: 300 *150 meter in dimension, side to a road, 4 meter wide 200 meter long loop canal for boating and two mountain shape artificial bumps, attached is a jhula park having 3-4 rides, snacks coffe south indian food available but not good,
